duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide safe, comfortable, and high-quality dialysis treatment to patients, including initiating, monitoring, and terminating treatment.
Prepare machines for hemodialysis treatments, clean and disinfect machines after treatment, and conduct machine safety checks and logging results for quality control.
Adhere to company policies, procedures, and state/federal laws and regulations, including participating in staff meetings and continuing education offerings.
Gather patient stats before and after treatment, and collect patient blood samples per physician orders.

education_certification.credential: Certification as a Hemodialysis Technician or Dialysis Technician as per state-specific requirements.
